html: On this day 226 years ago, the first president of the Republic of Texas was born! Happy Birthday, Sam Houston, and Happy Texas Independence Day, y’all...GOD Bless Sam Houston and GOD Bless Texas!

html: The 59 delegates who signed this document sought the freedom to form their own system of government. Texans took up arms to defend their freedom, and many died fighting for their right to self-govern. The Republic of Texas would join the United States in 1845 as the 28th state.
